1112.content:
"Oh, you're leaving..." Saria said, and Link turned around. She was sad to see the Hylian boy go. Although he didn't really belong in the forest, it always felt like he was a part of it, somehow. Link and Saria parted ways, and although she left him an Ocarina to contact her with, it was as if a piece of her heart had been torn away. She sighed, and leaned against the ropes of the rope bridge... and promptly fell over.

         Saria landed on her ass in the middle of the grassy clearing, startled. She got up and dusted herself off. Although she was quite far from town, she knew her way around these woods. This would be hardly more than a small setback for her. Saria turned around and found herself face-to-face with the Skullkid. She coiled back in horror. The Skullkid was an outcast from Kokiri society, often forgotten in the winding paths of the lost woods. However, today he seemed to have a renewed vigor. A certain lust in his eyes.
         "Sssso," said the Skullkid, drooling. "a juiiiicy morsel has fallen all alone..." Saria took a step back at these words. The Skullkid's bony arms reached toward her.
         "Stay back, you asshole!" Saria cried, but there was nothing to stop the Skullkid.

         Saria was tied to a stump out in the far dregs of the lost woods. No one came out here, and no one would come to her aid. Instead she had to take whatever the Skullkid was preparing to dish out. To Saria's surprise, he returned not nude but with a platter of food.
         "What the hell are you doing?" Saria asked angrily, thrashing at her bonds.
         "Hhhhhheh, don't you worry abouuuut that." he grabbed a large hunk of some sort of seared meat and held it to Saria's mouth. "Here, pretty girlllll, eaaaat." Saria looked at it with disgust. "Llllet's mmmmake this eeeeasy, why ddddon't we?" Saria still refused. "Wwwell then." said the Skullkid, before thrusting the food into Saria's mouth.

         "MMMMMPH! MMMMMPH!"
         "Cccheeew, and swallow." Saria did as she was told, gulping down hard.
         "WHAT THE HELL?" Saria shouted, trying to work her way free from the ropes. The ropes held tight.
         "You are going to be my plump forest maiden." The Skullkid explained, grinning.
         "I will do no such thing. Get me the hell out of here." Saria said as sternly as possible, still working against her bonds.
         "Mmm. I was afraid you'd say that." the Skullkid's speech had become succinct and to the point. He merely stepped backwards, and enchanted viney tendrils took his place. Some sort of sentient plant began to pick up several food items at once. "Sssshame, rrrealy. I tttthought you'd preffffer the easy wwwway." said the Skullkid as the tendrils moved towards Saria's mouth. Now she was panicking.

         "WAIT! WE CAN DO IT THE EASY WAY! WE CAN DO ANY-" her sentence was cut off as the food was shoved into her mouth. Great hunks of meat. Mashed root vegitables. Berries. Forest foods. It was all Saria could do to swallow fast enough. Food was dripping from her face as she attempted to take it all in. Hard gulps were taken as food went down her esophagus without being chewed. Each tendril tried to bring food as fast as possible, and there was easily a dozen of them. The Skullkid oversaw this with joy. Saria began to feel full, but that was no deterrent for the plant. Saria cried hot, salty tears as she was stuffed beyond the brim, and then stuffed further beyond that. Her stomach looked like she'd swallowed an Octorok whole. The green tunic she wore was stretched almost to ripping, it had ridden up to above her bellybutton and her panties were the only thing left covering her bottom. The tendrils withdrew, and her grease covered chin was all that was left of the food that once covered the platter. The ropes that constricted her now all covered her breasts, there was no more room around her middle. Saria's tummy was turning pink. She rubbed her aching belly and moaned. Her overstuffed stomach lay in her lap, almost out to her knees. Saria burped in between sobs and worked at her stomach with her hands to try and alleviate her aching midriff. The Skullkid walked over and set his head down on Saria's giant belly and began to rub it himself.
         "You are sssssso beautiffffful." he cooed, kissing her enormous globular stomach. Saria couldn't think. The pain was too much. Skullkid got up, and left his plump forest maiden. In this clearing, she should be safe from everyone except skull kids. Night fell, and Saria fell into fitful, drifting sleep.

11131.content:
Saria cautiously slid down the side of the dried-up lake and reached the bottom, where she could just spy what appeared to be a stick of some sort lodged in the ground. "Hm? That's odd," she remarked to herself, "Who could have left this here?" As the Kokiri girl walked toward it, she paused for a second when a radiant, green glow began to emanate from the lower end of the stick...though it surprised her, at the same time she felt oddly drawn to it. She reached out and grabbed the shaft of the stick, pulling with all her might until she finally uprooted it, revealing it to be some sort of staff, with a brightly glowing green gem at its tip. "Wow..." She could feel powerful magic at work within the strange staff-- from her time as a Sage, she'd grown familiar with such sensations, but this one felt special for some reason.

"Whoever left this must have been some kind of powerful wizard," she muttered, still talking aloud to herself. "I wonder what it does?" As if in response, the light from the scepter brightened to blinding levels for a moment, and when it stopped, Saria was shocked to find...a huge pile of desserts sitting in front of her! Decadent chocolate cakes, pies of several flavours, cookies, cupcakes...pretty much all the major bases were covered. "What the heck?! It...it just makes food appear? Well that doesn't seem very interesting...I mean, sure, it's practical, I guess, but not exactly the kind of awesome magic I was expecting..." Within mere seconds, however, Saria found her disappointment at the staff's abilities fading as a powerful hunger began to take hold of her. The longer she stared at the smorgasbord of sweets, the more she felt like she simply had to eat them all...and, soon enough, she did! The green-haired girl tore into them with reckless abandon, shoving pastries into her mouth like she'd never seen food before in her life. So occupied was she with her sudden gluttony that she didn't notice how, with every bite, she began to grow fatter and fatter. Her belly quickly pushed out from under her green top, hanging down onto her lap and quickly developing a series of soft rolls as it grew, while just above them, her previously flat chest rapidly developed into a pair of increasingly huge breasts, which rested heavily atop her belly and pushed out from beneath her shirt (which was already riding up from her belly's growth) until they came flopping out from under it. Meanwhile, her cheeks swelled big and round, while multiple chins began to hang from below them, slapping against her boobs as she continued her frenzied chewing, and her arms fattened and thickened till they tore through her sleeves. Below them, her now thick and sausage-like fingers continued to shovel yet more food into her gaping maw, while her growing ass easily destroyed her shorts, which had already ridden up severely on her fattening thighs...

By the time she was finally through, Saria had ballooned into a 1000-lb. blob-- her clothes had been utterly demolished by her sudden gain, and she was left sitting on her now massive rear, in a daze. Every bit of food the staff had conjured was gone, and after a few awkward seconds went by, she came back to her senses. "Huh...?" she muttered groggily, before trying to move and finding it to be much harder than expected. "Wha...what the hell just happened?!" The blobby Kokiri's eyes went as wide as dinner plates as she looked down at her newly-fattened form. She found herself briefly captivated by her now-enormous breasts, but quickly returned to her frantic state of mind, causing her blubber to jiggle and wobble frantically as she tried to get up. It took a great deal of effort, but Saria did manage to hoist herself up onto her chubby feet, though mobility was clearly not going to be easy for her all the same. "This is a-- BBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!-- disaster!" she cried, belching thunderously in the middle of her sentence and making her 6 chins flap about as she did. "I don't know what if going on here, but I need to get to the bottom of it, fast..."

111321221.content:
Saria was now waddling through Castle Town, looking around the main plaza for her beloved Link. Her massive, flabby body was drawing stares of all kinds from the people in the plaza. Some men and women were looking at her in disgust, as was to be expected at her new size. Some of the larger women of Castle Town were staring in admiration, because if this newcomer could be unashamed of her endless rolls, why couldn't they enjoy their much more reasonable sizes. Still other people stared at her in simple awe that a person could even reach such an absurd size. Lastly, there was a surprisingly large amount of men and women staring at her with lust shining in their eyes as they took in the sight of her gargantuan form.

It was for the last group that Saria further exaggerated the waddle that was now her natural way of walking. With every step her rolls jiggled back and forth until she resembled an ocean, with her waves of fat rolling back and forth as hypnotically as the tide. Saria made sure that every person in the square had an opportunity to stare at and ogle her marvelous body.

After wandering aimlessly and simply basking in the awe emanating from the people, Saria noticed a group of people that were staring at something besides her. She saw a small crowd gathered around an archery hut, and heard cheers of encouragement and excitement coming from that direction. Saria was naturally curious about what could be so enthralling that it could cause about 30 people to not even notice a three-and-half ton woman waddling through the plaza. She walked up to one of the store's windows as she was much too big to fit through the door, and took a peek inside.

What Saria saw inside seemed simply impossible, even considering her own recent weight gain. Inside the shack, she saw her soon-to-be lover, Link, shooting fake rupees out of the air while wearing a blindfold. Every few seconds, the owner of the shop or a member of the crowd would throw another rupee into the air, only for it to be shattered by another arrow from the "Hero of Time". After Link had shot sixteen more rupees, he took of his blindfold and gave a flamboyant bow to the crowd around him. He started making his way to the door as people slowly moved out of his way.

Saria saw a perfect opportunity to show Link the new her. She left her spot by the window and moved to a spot a few feet behind the center of the crowd. As she predicted, Link soon walked backwards out of the crowd as he waved away the people trying to get autographs and the like. Turning around, Link broke into a run, only to smash into Saria's massive belly, bounce off of it, and slam into the ground.

Link climbed to his feet and shook his head to clear the dizziness from slamming into the ground. When he looked up to see what he had run into and quickly rubbed his eyes trying to clear away what he thought was an hallucination. When he pulled his hands away, his vision was unchanged. In front of Link was the largest belly he had ever seen on either a living being or even a larger than life statue. Barely tearing his eyes away from the orb in front of him, Link moved his gaze upwards, only to be met with two more orbs. Now Link gazed upon a pair of breasts nearly as massive as the belly he had just seen, two nearly incomprehensible globes capped with long, thick nipples , and areola at least a foot in diameter.

Blood started to drip from Link's nose as his gave was held seemingly by the gravity of the breasts alone. Link continued to stare until the titanic, obviously female figure bent down, bringing a smiling head covered with vivid green hair into his gaze.

"Hiya Link," interjected Saria, "That was some amazing arrow work in there."

Link only knew one person with green hair that actually knew him by name, but he couldn't reconcile the image of his childhood friend with the behemoth in front of him.

"Saria?" Link stuttered out.

"You know anyone else with green hair?" Saria asked playfully.

"How are you out of the Kokiri Forest?" Link asked after regaining control of his speech, "and how did you..."

"Get so wonderfully huge," finished Saria.

Link blushed as he realized he had been staring at his oldest friend naked.

"Yeah, I guess," Link said while turning away.

"Come out to the field with me and I'll tell you," said Saria.

Saria stood back up to her new full height, turned around, and started towards the nearest city exit. Link followed, and blushed even redder when he got a full view of another of Saria's gargantuan assets... Her ass. The two leviathan spheres of fat were completely nude like the rest of her, and the way they jiggled and bounced with each step, along with the enormous amount of cleavage produced, was taking a toll on Link's mind.

Link wordlessly followed Saria, barely noticing when Castle Town transitioned into Hyrule Field. Saria grinned madly as she nearly felt Link's gaze resting on her massive butt, and occasionally travel up to her back rolls, or down to her thighs. Slowly stopping as to not bounce Link to the ground again, Saria turned around and looked link straight in the face.
